title: Automated Alerts for Health Monitoring
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to automatically alert me and my family if my health readings indicate any abnormalities, so that I can receive timely assistance and maintain my independence.

title: Medication Adherence Support
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to remind me about my medication schedule and provide tips for managing my arthritis pain, so that I can remain physically active and volunteer without worrying about my health.

title: Caregiver Communication Hub – Shared Health Updates and Alerts
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to receive shared health updates and alerts from my caregivers so that I can stay informed about my health status and effectively manage my well-being while continuing to volunteer and stay socially connected.

title: Emergency Contact Notifications
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to automatically notify my emergency contacts if I don't respond to health alerts, so that I can ensure my family's peace of mind and receive timely help in case of an emergency.

title: Long-term Health Tracking – Data Visualization for Health Trends
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to visualize my long-term health data and trends so that I can monitor my well-being and manage my arthritis pain effectively.

title: Voice-Guided Medication Instructions
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to receive voice-guided medication reminders and instructions so that I can manage my arthritis pain effectively and ensure I stay healthy while maintaining my busy schedule.

title: Health Monitoring and Reminders
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to monitor my health conditions and send medication reminders so that I can manage my arthritis pain effectively and maintain my well-being without feeling overwhelmed.
